0110100000011111 1001110011001110 1 -> sum: 0000010011101110, cout: 1
1000110000001011 1111000101101001 0 -> sum: 0111110101110100, cout: 1
0101011101000000 1000001101101110 1 -> sum: 1101101010101111, cout: 0
1101001011001000 0010110111011001 0 -> sum: 0000000010100001, cout: 1
0010100001011010 1001001001011101 0 -> sum: 1011101010110111, cout: 0
1010011000110011 1100111100011100 1 -> sum: 0111010101010000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
